data.lyric:
[ti:Hollywood's Bleeding]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hollywood's Bleeding - Post Malone
[00:14.80]Hollywood's bleeding vampires feedin'
[00:18.33]Darkness turns to dust
[00:21.89]Everyone's gone but no one's leavin'
[00:25.53]Nobody left but us
[00:29.06]Tryna chase a feelin' but we'll never feel it
[00:32.71]Ridin' on the last train home
[00:36.30]Dyin' in our sleep we're living out a dream
[00:39.44]We only make it out alone
[00:43.54]I just keep on hopin' that you call me
[00:46.97]You say you wanna see me but you can't right now
[00:50.13]You never took the time to get to know me
[00:53.95]Was scared of losin' somethin' that we never found
[00:57.40]We're running out of reasons but we can't let go
[01:04.44]Yeah Hollywood is bleeding but we call it home
[01:12.85]Outside the winter sky turnin' grey
[01:15.88]City up in smoke it's only ash when it rains
[01:18.87]Howl at the moon and go to sleep in the day
[01:21.83]Love for everybody 'til the drugs fade away
[01:24.84]In the mornin' blocking out the sun with the shades
[01:27.62]She gotta check her pulse and tell herself that she okay
[01:30.65]It seem like dying young is an honor
[01:33.30]But who'd be at my funeral I wonder
[01:36.31]I go out and all they eyes on me
[01:39.32]I show out do you like what you see
[01:42.57]And now they closin' in on me
[01:45.46]Let 'em sharpen all they teeth
[01:46.95]This is more than I can handle
[01:49.09]Blood in my Lambo'
[01:50.58]Wish I could go oh I'm losin' ho-ope
[01:53.52]I light a candle some Palo Santo
[01:56.56]For all these demons wish I could just go on
[02:03.78]I just keep on hopin' that you call me
[02:06.91]You say you wanna see me but you can't right now
[02:10.22]You never took the time to get to know me
[02:14.08]Was scared of losin' somethin' that we never found
[02:17.41]We're running out of reasons but we can't let go
[02:24.57]Yeah Hollywood is bleeding but we call it home
data.trans:
[ti:Hollywood's Bleeding]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:14.80]喋血的好莱坞 吸血鬼贪婪地吮吸鲜血
[00:18.33]黑暗烟消云散
[00:21.89]所有人都消失了 可是没有人离开
[00:25.53]除了我们 没有人离开
[00:29.06]试图追寻一种感觉 可我们从未感觉到
[00:32.71]搭上最后一趟列车 回到家中
[00:36.30]酣然入睡 我们正在实现梦想
[00:39.44]我们只能自力更生
[00:43.54]我一直希望你能打电话给我
[00:46.97]你说你想见我 可现在不是时候
[00:50.13]你从未付出时间来好好了解我
[00:53.95]害怕失去爱 可惜我们从未拥有过
[00:57.40]我们已经找不到理由 可我们不愿放手
[01:04.44]喋血的好莱坞 可我们称之为家
[01:12.85]在外边游荡 冬天的天空变得灰蒙蒙的
[01:15.88]城市被浓雾笼罩 即便是落雨也尽是灰烬
[01:18.87]夜晚对着月亮咆哮 白天呼呼大睡
[01:21.83]爱所有人 直到你清醒过来
[01:24.84]清晨 戴上墨镜 遮挡刺眼的阳光
[01:27.62]她检查了一下脉搏 告诉自己一切安好
[01:30.65]似乎以英年早逝为荣
[01:33.30]可我不知道谁会出席我的葬礼
[01:36.31]我走出家门 所有人都看着我
[01:39.32]我现身 你是否喜欢你眼中所见
[01:42.57]此刻他们包围着我
[01:45.46]让他们摩拳擦掌 跃跃欲试
[01:46.95]这超出了我的能力范围
[01:49.09]鲜血染红了我的兰博基尼
[01:50.58]我希望可以脱身我渐渐失去希望
[01:53.52]我焚香 点燃一根蜡烛
[01:56.56]试图驱赶恶魔 希望我可以继续前行
[02:03.78]我一直希望你能打电话给我
[02:06.91]你说你想见我 可现在不是时候
[02:10.22]你从未付出时间来好好了解我
[02:14.08]害怕失去爱 可惜我们从未拥有过
[02:17.41]我们已经找不到理由 可我们不愿放手
[02:24.57]喋血的好莱坞 可我们称之为家
